These are the rankings for teams based on our spatial-based algorithm as of `r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`

```{r, results='hide'}
library(SpatialBall)
Rank <- SpatialRating(Seasondata = Season2018)
```


```{r}
knitr::kable(Rank, digits = 3)
```
